1900-2000
text.text: La historia de México con enfoque en cuestiones sociales, económicas y tecnólogicas por Carlos Eduardo Sanchez Torres

text.headline: Why the Future Doesn't Need Us?
text.text: Our most powerful 21st-century technologies: robotics, genetic engineering, and nanotech are threatening to make humans an endangered species. B. Joy, “Why the Future Doesn’t Need Us,” WIRED, Apr. 2000. [Online]. Available: https://www.wired.com/2000/04/joy-2/. [Accessed: Aug. 25, 2022]
